hero.title: Building Digital Connections
hero.subtitle: InternetFriends
hero.description: Expert web development and digital solutions for modern businesses. We create beautiful, fast, and scalable applications that connect people and drive results.

about.title: About InternetFriends
about.subtitle: Passionate about creating digital experiences
about.description: We are a team of dedicated developers and designers committed to building exceptional web applications that make a difference.
about.missionText: To empower businesses with cutting-edge digital solutions that drive growth and create meaningful connections with their audiences.
about.visionText: To be the leading provider of innovative web development services, known for our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

features.title: Why Choose InternetFriends
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build modern web applications
features.description: We provide comprehensive solutions that combine cutting-edge technology with proven design patterns to deliver exceptional digital experiences.

modernDevelopment.title: Modern Development
modernDevelopment.description: Built with the latest technologies including Next.js, TypeScript, and cutting-edge frameworks for optimal performance.

designSystems.title: Design Systems
designSystems.description: Comprehensive design systems with atomic components, consistent theming, and scalable architecture.

performanceFirst.title: Performance First
performanceFirst.description: Optimized for speed with code splitting, lazy loading, and modern build tools for lightning-fast experiences.

securityReliability.title: Security & Reliability
securityReliability.description: Enterprise-grade security with testing, monitoring, and deployment best practices built-in.

userExperience.title: User Experience
userExperience.description: Intuitive interfaces designed for accessibility, usability, and conversion optimization.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile Optimized
mobileOptimized.description: Responsive designs that work perfectly across all devices with progressive web app capabilities.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by businesses worldwide
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our clients have to say about working with InternetFriends.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project?
contact.description: Let's discuss how we can help bring your vision to life. We're here to answer any questions and provide a free consultation.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

footer.tagline: Building digital connections, one project at a time.
footer.newsletterDescription: Stay updated with our latest news and insights.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Showcasing our best work
portfolio.description: Take a look at some of the projects we've completed for our clients. Each project represents our commitment to quality and innovation.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your project
pricing.description: No hidden fees. No surprises. Just honest pricing for quality work.

seo.defaultDescription: Expert web development and digital solutions for modern businesses. We create beautiful, fast, and scalable applications.
seo.keywords: web development, digital solutions, next.js, react, typescript, design systems
